system.requirements: Explorator, RT Rank 3+, Willpower 35+, Forbidden Lore (Archeotech) +10 Skill. Does not have "Untouchable" Trait, has uncovered at least one psychically active artifact to which they have a morbid fascination of.

description.value:
These deeply heretical Explorators install strange Xeno-Tech into their very beings that possess psychic properties. This technology bestows onto them psuedo-psychic powers at the great chagrin of the wider Mechanicus who may hunt them down should they be found out.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Acolyte of Abraxas Automatically Gain Enemy (Mechanicus) and Rival (Mechanicus) Talents. Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talents Corrupted Charge and Unhallowed Discovery

system.benefit:
